customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

customengraving.name: Water Lily
customengraving.description: This plant is the purest and most beautiful thing you're likely to find in the Dungeon.

customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

action.text: Out here on the water, you feel calm and clear-headed. There's time and peace enough to reflect on past events as well as think ahead to your future.

customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

customengraving.name: Water Lily
customengraving.description: This plant is the purest and most beautiful thing you're likely to find in the Dungeon.

customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

action.text: Out here on the water, you feel warm and fuzzy-headed. Not to mention nauseated. That's probably from all those frogs you've been licking.

custombreakable.name: Skull Pile
custombreakable.description: The heads of dead men, stacked high as a warning.

custombreakable.name: Skull Pile
custombreakable.description: These have been stripped of their skin and other soft tissues.

custombreakable.name: Skull Pile
custombreakable.description: A pile of discarded skulls and other bones.

custombreakable.name: Skull Pile
custombreakable.description: Trophies? The display items of a diggle grocery store? Undead in the making? Whatever the explanation, it's certainly unpleasant.

customblocker.name: Witchdoctor's Hut
customblocker.description: This hut is set off a little from the rest of the village. It's like cannibal suburbs.

customblocker.name: Witchdoctor's Hut
customblocker.description: I told the witchdoctor, I was in love with you. He killed me and ate my corpse anyway.

customblocker.name: Cannibal's Hut
customblocker.description: The scent coming from within this hut is distrubingly enticing.

customblocker.name: Cannibal's Hut
customblocker.description: Smells so good, it makes me want to jump in that firepit.

customblocker.name: Cannibal's Firepit
customblocker.description: The village has a fire lit just for you.

customblocker.name: Cannibal's Firepit
customblocker.description: They'd like to have you for dinner.

customblocker.name: Cannibal Hut
customblocker.description: Beware - this hut has been known to eat it's own kind. Which would be totally scary, were you a hut.

customblocker.name: Cannibal Hut
customblocker.description: Nobody tell Jabba.

action.text: Seriously? You stepped into the firepit at the cannibal village? What were you thinking?
Your dedication to the procurement of supper is inspiring. That steak won't grill itself, they said. You showed them.

customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

customengraving.name: Water Lily
customengraving.description: This plant is the purest and most beautiful thing you're likely to find in the Dungeon.

customengraving.name: Lilypad
customengraving.description: This giant waterlily pad looks sturdy enough to support your weight.

customblocker.name: Cannibal Hut
customblocker.description: There used to be three other huts here on Cannibal Island, but this one ate the rest.

customblocker.name: Cannibal Hut
customblocker.description: It's part of a chain - sorta like pizza hut. They've got a special going on for the new stuffed-crust longpig.

action.text: Out here on the water, you feel calm and clear-headed. There's time and peace enough to reflect on past events as well as think ahead to your future.

customblocker.name: Witchdoctor's Hut
customblocker.description: Second-cousin to the Dread Gazebo

customblocker.name: Straw Hut
customblocker.description: I'll huff, and I'll puff, and I'll Tenebrous Rift your house down! Dang, it's got necro-resist.

customblocker.name: Witchdoctor's Hut
customblocker.description: Second-cousin to the Dread Gazebo

customblocker.name: Witchdoctor's Hut
customblocker.description: Dredmor is such a demanding taskmaster, he even makes these huts take correspondence-courses in witchdoctoring.

customblocker.name: Straw Hut
customblocker.description: This little witchdoctor built his house from straw. That's actually the least alarming option offered by the cannibal architects.

customblocker.name: Straw Hut
customblocker.description: I'll huff, and I'll puff, and I'll Tenebrous Rift your house down! Dang, it's got necro-resist.

customblocker.name: Creepy Cannibal's Hut
customblocker.description: Wait a minute. These guys are cannibals, but they're not human... why was I so worried about them?

customblocker.name: Creepy Cannibal's Hut
customblocker.description: But what if they're secretly cannibal... WERE-HUMANS!?!?

customblocker.name: Cannibal Hut
customblocker.description: Behold the hut which preys upon other huts!

customblocker.name: Cannibal Hut
customblocker.description: My doctoral thesis is a study of the architectural cannibalism of the indiginous cultures of the 14th floor.

customblocker.name: Cannibal's Firepit
customblocker.description: The village has a fire lit just for you.

customblocker.name: Cannibal's Firepit
customblocker.description: They'd like to have you for dinner.

action.text: Seriously? You stepped into the firepit at the cannibal village? What were you thinking?
Your dedication to the procurement of supper is inspiring. That steak won't grill itself, they said. You showed them.

customblocker.name: Pirate Flag
customblocker.description: A deathly flag. There'll be no mercy if you take this treasure.

custombreakable.name: Last Bit of Debris
custombreakable.description: Hastily placed boulders block this tunnel. What could be behind them?

custombreakable.name: Clogged Tunnel
custombreakable.description: Hastily placed boulders block this tunnel. What could be behind them?

custombreakable.name: Easily-Moved Rubble
custombreakable.description: Hastily placed boulders block this tunnel. What could be behind them?

custombreakable.name: Suspicious Blockage
custombreakable.description: Hastily placed boulders block this tunnel. What could be behind them?

customengraving.name: X Marks the Spot
customengraving.description: Tis but the first of many buried treasures ye'll be pillaging!

customblocker.name: Diggle Nest
customblocker.description: There seems to be something hidden beneath this nest. If only you could figure out a way to move the nest and look beneath it.

action.text: The diggle had hidden away a little nest egg.

room.name: Treasure Tunnel with false back
room.usefixedname: There is not a hidden treasure here, move along.

customblocker.name: Generic Pirate Flag
customblocker.description: The Jolly Roger, the universal symbol of the pirate with no sense of individuality.

custombreakable.name: Makeshift Wall
custombreakable.description: Someone sealed something in behind this wall.

custombreakable.name: Breakable Wall
custombreakable.description: Something sealed someone behind this wall.

action.text: Some pirate was planning on putting treasure in here, but just never got around to it. You believe me, don't you?

customblocker.name: Cargo Hold Instructions
customblocker.description: Only stack useless junk in this cargo hold. Good stuff should be shipped downstairs for use by diggles more important than yourself.

customengraving.name: X Marks the Spot
customengraving.description: Arrr! Ye've found the lost goodie island.

action.text: Arrr! Ye've found the lost goodie island.

customblocker.name: Iron Island Sigil
customblocker.description: Arrr! Ye've found the hidden treasure trove of the Iron Islanders.

customblocker.name: Iron Island Sigil
customblocker.description: Arrr! Ye've found the hidden treasure trove of the Iron Islanders.

customengraving.name: X Marks the Spot
customengraving.description: Arrr! Ye've found the hidden treasure trove of the Iron Islanders.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden weapon rack.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden weapon rack.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden weapon rack.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden weapon rack.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden weapon rack.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden weapon rack.

customblocker.name: Armour Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden armour rack.

customblocker.name: Armour Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden armour rack.

customengraving.name: X Marks the Spot
customengraving.description: The eyes are the window of the soul. This place looks pretty empty inside.

customengraving.name: X Marks the Spot
customengraving.description: Dead men's eyes should be covered with coins for the ferryman.

action.text: Plucking the pennies from the eyes of a dead man? Now that's piracy!

customblocker.name: Huge Pirate Flag
customblocker.description: Looks like you won the pirate lottery.

customblocker.name: Huge Pirate Flag
customblocker.description: Somebody really likes the Jolly Roger.

customengraving.name: Receptacle
customengraving.description: A receptacle for runes.

customengraving.name: Receptacle
customengraving.description: A receptacle for runes.

customengraving.name: Receptacle
customengraving.description: A receptacle for runes.

action.text: A secret door to a treasure room opens!
A secret door to a treasure room opens!
A secret door to a treasure room opens!
A secret door to a treasure room opens!
A secret door to a treasure room opens!

customblocker.name: Poopdeck
customblocker.description: If ye be squeamish or delicate, ye can call it an aftcastle.

customblocker.name: Poopdeck
customblocker.description: If ye be squeamish or delicate, ye can call it an aftcastle.

customblocker.name: Poopdeck
customblocker.description: If ye be squeamish or delicate, ye can call it an aftcastle.

customblocker.name: Ship's Helm
customblocker.description: This is what I call the helm. People seem to think you can't be called the Cap'm unless you drive a boat.

customblocker.name: Ship's Sails
customblocker.description: Sailing the Seas of Milk we be. Unless the milk curdles. Then we be sailing the Seas of Cheese... but that'd be a totally different band, and the mixed references are confusing enough already.

customblocker.name: Falconet
customblocker.description: A smallish cannon that can handle cannonballs or grapeshot.

customblocker.name: Falconet
customblocker.description: Really not much more than an over-weight musket.

customblocker.name: Cap'm Crisp
customblocker.description: A noble sea Cap'm, fallen victim of a diabetic coma or corporate rebranding. Quick, grab the loot!

action.text: You hear rattling bones. 'Arrr! I'll be dead again before I let you take my crispberries. Minions! Attack!'

customblocker.name: Captain Whitebeard's Remains
customblocker.description: Here lies the Pirate Nicholas Whitebeard, who was slain by a mutinous crew of elvish were-reindeer.

customblocker.name: Bones
customblocker.description: Those don't look like human bones. Reindeer bones, maybe?

customblocker.name: Bones
customblocker.description: Looks like Captain Whitebeard took at least one of the mutineers with him.

customblocker.name: Bones
customblocker.description: Looks like Captain Whitebeard took at least one of the mutineers with him.

customblocker.name: Bartholomew Robert's Flag
customblocker.description: You've found the treasure of Bartholomew Roberts, a Welsh sailor who turned pirate after being captured by the same. The ultimatum was, he turn Pirate, or they turn Welsh.

customblocker.name: Bartholomew Robert's Flag
customblocker.description: Captain Roberts adapted to his new life quickly. It took him only 6 weeks to go from protesting captive to captain of his own Pirate ship.

customblocker.name: Bartholomew Robert's Flag
customblocker.description: Bartholomew Roberts is known to be pistol-proof and invincible. The sort of man who traps his treasures, and treasures his traps.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Stout iron bars.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Stout iron bars.

action.text: You hear the sound of heavy metal gates slowly opening.
You hear a wonderful clatter, like a chest full of coins spilling forth onto the floor.
You hear a wonderful clatter, like a chest full of coins spilling forth onto the floor.
You hear a wonderful clatter, like a chest full of coins spilling forth onto the floor.
You hear a wonderful clatter, like a chest full of coins spilling forth onto the floor.

customblocker.name: Blackbeard's Flag
customblocker.description: You've found the treasure of Edward Teach, the infamous Blackbeard! If he's not here, he's probably off blockading a city or sailing the Queen Anne's Revenge.

customblocker.name: Blackbeard's Flag
customblocker.description: Blackbeard wears lit matches in his hat, and flaming bits of fuse burning in his beard. He must have a lot of Conflagratory Resistance.

customblocker.name: Blackbeard's Flag
customblocker.description: Blackbeard carries a brace of pistols with him at any given time. He keeps extras here, loaded, because you never know when you'll need to shoot a ship full of limey bastards cold dead.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of this heavy metal grate are warm to the touch.

action.text: You are deafened by a huge explosion, like the roar of a cannon!

customblocker.name: Calico Jack Rackham's Flag
customblocker.description: You've found the treasure of Calico Jack Rackham and his crew.

customblocker.name: Calico Jack Rackham's Flag
customblocker.description: They say behind every good man is a good woman.

customblocker.name: Calico Jack Rackham's Flag
customblocker.description: Of course, in this case, it's behind the devilish man are two even more devilish women!

customblocker.name: Calico Jack Rackham's Flag
customblocker.description: Anne Bonny and Mary Read are far more fearsome than Calico Jack ever was!

action.text: If you'd have fought like a Man, Jack, ye wouldn't have died like a Diggle!

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the starboard bow.

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: The recoil from firing has pushed this cannon back from the gunport.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the port bow of this iron-clad vessel.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: The recoil from firing has pushed this cannon back from the gunport.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: Property of Captain Bonnet, commissioned July 1717, for the warship Revenge.

customblocker.name: Starboard Sabotage
customblocker.description: This cannon has misfired, and is likely to explode with the slightest bump. Stay far away from it!

customblocker.name: Stede Bonnet's Flag
customblocker.description: You've found the treasure of Stede Bonnet, the Gentleman Pirate.

customblocker.name: Stede Bonnet's Flag
customblocker.description: Most pirate ships are re-purposed merchant vessels, but wealthy land owner Stede Bonnet spent his inheritance custom-building his first pirate warship.

action.text: If you had read the description of that cannon, you'd have known not to stand anywhere near it.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: Heavy iron bars block the path.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: Heavy iron bars block the path.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: Heavy iron bars block all hope for escape.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: Heavy iron bars block all hope for escape.

customblocker.name: Amateur Butchery Project
customblocker.description: You still really, really, don't want to know where all this meat came from.

customblocker.name: Captain of the Nostra Signiora de Victoria
customblocker.description: This is what happens if you surrender to Undead Commodore Edward Low.

customblocker.name: Edward Low's Flag
customblocker.description: This flag bears the blood-red skeletal emblem of the Dred Pirate Edward Low. He has declared war against the world!

customblocker.name: Edward Low's Flag
customblocker.description: Edward Low is a savage and desperate man known for his amazing and grotesque brutality. Even Sherlock Holmes fears him.

customblocker.name: Edward Low's Flag
customblocker.description: Edward Low is a foul monster with a sharp and bloody sense of humor. He gives his ships dainty names to further humiliate those he destroys.

customblocker.name: Edward Low's Flag
customblocker.description: If you surrender, he may well cut parts off of your face, broil them while you watch, and force-feed them to you.

action.text: When you pull the skull out of its recessed nook, it unleashes a downpour of treasure!

customblocker.name: Bottle Statue
customblocker.description: An over-sized stone replica of an ornate bottle. If you peer down the hole, you can see a tiny stone replica of a Djinn deep inside it.

customblocker.name: Broken Bottles
customblocker.description: Shattered bits of booze-soaked glass.

customblocker.name: Broken Bottles
customblocker.description: Shattered bits of booze-soaked glass.

customblocker.name: Broken Bottles
customblocker.description: Shattered bits of booze-soaked glass.

customblocker.description: Shattered bits of booze-soaked glass.

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the starboard bow.

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: The recoil from firing has pushed this cannon back from the gunport.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the port bow. Don't tell me you thought this ship was a library.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: The recoil from firing has pushed this cannon back from the gunport.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the port bow.

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the starboard bow.

customblocker.name: Ship's Wheel
customblocker.description: No matter how much you spin it, the ship never seems to move.

customblocker.name: Poopdeck
customblocker.description: If ye be squeamish or delicate, ye can call it an aftcastle.

customblocker.name: Poopdeck
customblocker.description: If ye be squeamish or delicate, ye can call it an aftcastle.

customblocker.name: Poopdeck
customblocker.description: If ye be squeamish or delicate, ye can call it an aftcastle.

customblocker.name: Demi-Cannon
customblocker.description: A demi-cannon fires 32-pound shot, weighs 4,000 pounds itself, has infravision to 60 feet and can detect secret doors on a roll of 1 to 4 on a d6.

customblocker.name: Falconet
customblocker.description: Sounds like a bird, but it be cannon I assure ye. Fires a niminy-piminy shot not more'n 2 to 3 pounds.

customblocker.name: Carronade
customblocker.description: It may look a lot like those other guns to a land-lubber such as yourself, but this is actually very different in certain obscure and technical details. A true pirate could tell the difference.

customblocker.name: Minion
customblocker.description: A Minion is a class of cannon that fires 4-pound shot and hopes one day to be promoted to full Henchman status.

customblocker.name: Ship's Sails
customblocker.description: Hands to halyards, me mateys!

customblocker.name: Ship's Sails
customblocker.description: The sails are full of wind, yet we don't seem to be going much of anywhere.
